wikipedia_page.main: General the Honourable Henry St John (1738 – 3 April 1818) was a senior British Army officer and politician who sat in the House of Commons from 1768 to 1784 and briefly in 1802. He also served as a Groom of the Bedchamber.

response: Henry St. John may refer to:
*Henry St. John (congressman) (1783–1869), U.S. Representative from Ohio
*John Creasey (1908–1973), who used the pen name Henry St. John Cooper
